Amen is a 2013 Malayalam-language Indian romantic musical satire directed by Lijo Jose Pellissery and starring Fahadh Faasil, Indrajith, Swati Reddy, Natasha Sahgal and Rachana Narayanankutty lead roles. Amen is the debut Malayalam film of Telugu actress Swati Reddy. The film hit the theaters on 22 March 2013, receiving rave reviews from critics and huge response from theatres.
